summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing (17/17 tests passing) and frontend UI testing. Fixed critical SelectItem empty value error on Courses page. All key features tested: health check, authentication, courses, cart, FAQs, admin dashboard.

fixed_bugs.issue: SelectItem value='' causing runtime error - A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Changed empty value to 'all' and updated onValueChange handlers

critical_code_review_comments: SMTP credentials are hardcoded in .env - consider using environment-specific configs for production
Courses have 0 modules and 0 lessons - content needs to be added via admin panel
seed_data_creation: Admin user and 4 sample courses seeded on startup
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs fully functional. Frontend courses page bug fixed. Admin dashboard accessible. All auth flows working. PayU payment configured in test mode. R2 storage and SMTP configured.

tested_features.health_endpoint: PASS - All services configured (database, smtp, r2_storage, payu)
tested_features.user_registration: PASS - Creates new unverified user with OTP
tested_features.user_login: PASS - Admin login works with JWT tokens
tested_features.courses_list: PASS - Returns 4 seeded courses with pagination
tested_features.course_detail: PASS - Returns full course info with modules/reviews
tested_features.frontend_landing: PASS - Hero, features, FAQ sections render correctly
tested_features.frontend_login: PASS - Login form submits and redirects to admin
tested_features.frontend_courses: PASS - Displays course grid with filters
